original_title: Trump just put an extra tariff on hundreds of common items, from deodorant to butter knives | CNN Business
article_summary: "President Trump's 50% steel and aluminum tariffs now apply to hundreds of imported goods, including spray deodorant, butter knives, and baby strollers. This move leaves importers with goods in transit in a difficult position, as they will have to pay significantly higher tariffs or risk losing money."</s>
